data.name: Rhythmetallic - Full Metal Expansion
data.detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks all music in the game.
From time to time, new music will be added constantly. That means all future songs are FREE to play as well if you've purchased this DLC!
Currently, there are 50+ songs unlocked by this DLC.

Song List:

Necropolis (Melodic death metal)

Abstract by Frameless Scar
Flames Of War by Ulfsark
Forces of Inertia by The Neologist
From the Ancients by The Neologist
Grimed Society by As I End
Kingdom Of None by Sermilion
Losing the Pieces by The Neologist
Miserium by As I End
Nightmares by Sermilion
Orb Of Destruction by Sermilion
Perseverance by Jacob Lizotte
Relentless by Ulfsark
Silent Ashes by As I End
The Abstract by The Neologist
The Holographic by The Neologist
The Rise Of Udhum by Ulfsark
Tyranny by Jacob Lizotte
Vomiting Lies by As I End

Djentle Destruction (Djent)

Disintegrate by Jacob Lizotte
Hall Of Doom by Depths of Titan
Inception by Jacob Lizotte
Invasion by Jacob Lizotte
Rooted In Evil by Jacob Lizotte
Run by Depths of Titan
Time Has Come by Depths of Titan
Ultimata by Jacob Lizotte
Welcome The King by Depths of Titan

Eternal Cataclysm (Thrash metal)

Cataclysm by Jacob Lizotte
Enslaved by Jacob Lizotte
Execute by Jacob Lizotte
Last Stand by Jacob Lizotte
Skeletal Remains by Jacob Lizotte

Heroic Journey (Power metal/Fantasy)

Battle Metal by Alexander Nakarada
Battle by Blind Wisdom
Berserker by Alexander Nakarada
Blood And Steel by Alexander Nakarada
Galahad Et Le Graal by Fell Fyre
Not Alone by Blind Wisdom
Now We Ride by Alexander Nakarada
The Abyss by Alexander Nakarada
The Age Of Darkness by Jacob Lizotte
Sword In My Hand by Fell Fyre

Dark Forest (Black metal)

Bleak by Jacob Lizotte
Cold Dark Hell by Jacob Lizotte
Dark Bloody Rivers by Krahnholm

Metal Forge (Heavy metal)

Digital Meltdown by Jacob Lizotte
Flying Free by Fell Fyre
Game Over by Jacob Lizotte
Lacerated by Jimmy Oldfield
Malice by Jacob Lizotte
The Lands of Oblivion by Mornar
Venomous by Jacob Lizotte
Violence Machine by Jacob Lizotte

data.short_description: Unlocks 40+ premium brutal metal music in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
